name: LazyApply
description: LazyApply automates job applications across platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed to streamline the job search process.
longDescription: LazyApply is a job application automation platform designed to simplify and accelerate the job search process for users in the USA and Canada. By leveraging AI technology, it enables users to apply to hundreds or thousands of jobs with a single click on platforms such as LinkedIn, Indeed, and ZipRecruiter. The platform eliminates repetitive manual tasks like form-filling and resume tailoring, saving significant time for job seekers. LazyApply also offers tools to generate cover letters, optimize resumes, and track application progress through an intuitive dashboard. Its mission is to make job searching more efficient, allowing users to focus on preparing for interviews and networking. Operated by PEVE VISIONS PRIVATE LIMITED, based in India, LazyApply prioritizes user privacy and offers lifetime access through a one-time payment model.
features: Automates job applications across platforms like LinkedIn, Indeed, and ZipRecruiter with a single click, saving hours of manual effort.
Uses AI to auto-fill application forms based on user resumes, reducing errors and ensuring consistency.
Generates personalized cover letters using AI to tailor applications for specific job roles.
Provides an analytics dashboard to track application progress and monitor referral emails in real-time.
Integrates with multiple job boards, including Glassdoor and CareerBuilder, for a comprehensive job search experience.
Offers resume management tools to upload and customize multiple resumes for different job applications.
Includes a Job GPT feature that crafts answers to open-ended application questions based on user profiles.
Supports automated referral email outreach to connect with employees at target companies.
Features a resume builder with over 30 templates and AI-powered resume scoring to optimize applications.
Provides lifetime access with free auto-updates, ensuring users always have the latest features.

faqs.question: What is LazyApply?
faqs.answer: LazyApply is an AI-powered platform that automates job applications on platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed, allowing users to apply to hundreds of jobs with minimal effort.

faqs.question: Does LazyApply offer a free trial?
faqs.answer: No, LazyApply does not offer a free trial, but users can request a live demo by emailing info@lazyapply.com.

faqs.question: Can I apply to jobs by email using LazyApply?
faqs.answer: Yes, LazyApply supports applying for jobs via email and automates sending customized referral emails to relevant company employees.

faqs.question: What is LazyApplyâ€™s refund policy?
faqs.answer: LazyApply offers a 30-day limited refund policy if users apply to fewer than 100 jobs and experience functionality issues, subject to review.

faqs.question: Does LazyApply work with all job platforms?
faqs.answer: LazyApply integrates with major job boards like LinkedIn, Indeed, ZipRecruiter, Glassdoor, and CareerBuilder, but it primarily targets 'Easy Apply' features.

faqs.question: How does the AI cover letter generator work?
faqs.answer: The AI cover letter generator creates tailored cover letters based on user resumes and job requirements, with editable templates for personalization.

faqs.question: Is my data safe with LazyApply?
faqs.answer: LazyApply, operated by PEVE VISIONS PRIVATE LIMITED, prioritizes user privacy and does not share or sell user data with third parties.

faqs.question: Does LazyApply provide customer support?
faqs.answer: Yes, LazyApply offers dedicated customer support and tutorials to assist users with setup and any questions or concerns.
